forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 65F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early then periods of showers late. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder is possible early. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Thunder is possible early. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 52F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening mixing with and changing to steady snow overnight. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 34F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
